message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $130. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $125?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $123. Would you be willing to accept that?
